answers.answer: Hi,Check with your diabetologist.Diabetes can cause peripheral neuritis and it can lead to such symptoms.Diabetes can cause an gamut of symptoms.Keep your sugar under control.Goodluck.

Are you currently on antidiabetic medications? Is your diabetes controlled? It is possible that your symptoms are a complication of un- or improperly controlled diabetes.  The chances of recovery from your condition would ultimately depend on the severity of nerve involvement.  Consult your endocrinologist to have your symptoms and diabetes managed.

question: hello sir,i have a problem in my right leg from last three months,i have lost my sensations & control from my leg,i have diabetes too,i want to know the chances of recover my sensations of leg,I'd b very thank full to you if you could give me some suggestions. thanx alot.
